item.title: Fortnite Getting Back to the Future Collaboration for Chapter 7
item.content:encoded:
Great Scott, it looks like Back to the Future is coming to Fortnite Chapter 7! Furthermore, players will be able to ride in style in the franchise‚Äôs iconic DeLorean sooner than later.

The upcoming Chapter 7 of Fortnite has been highly anticipated by fans for quite a bit. After a rather successful season, which featured The Simpsons, it seems the nostalgia factor is getting turned up now. Chapter 7 is starting with a Kill Bill collaboration, which sees Uma Thurman‚Äôs The Bride duel against assassin Yuki. However, the ode to classic cinema isn‚Äôt over, as an iconic car from a legendary franchise is officially driving its way to the live-service game.

The DeLorean from Back to the Future Coming to Fortnite on November 29th

In a tweet from DeLorean Labs, the company showed off a first look at the in-game version of the DeLorean. It looks like it comes from a picture from BatPlay47, known for his Fortnite leaks. The Fortnite version of the car looks almost identical to the one used in Back to the Future, as well as the real-life counterpart. In addition, it will come out on November 29th, 2025, the same day as Chapter 7.

For those who don‚Äôt know, the Back to the Future movies, which were released in the latter half of the 1980s, used the DeLorean as a plot device. With upgrades from Doc Brown, the vehicle could travel through time at light speed, sending him and Marty McFly to different periods like the Wild West and the future. While it is also a notable car brand, the avid popularity of the movies made it a household name, still to this day. With the collab, perhaps we‚Äôll see Marty and Doc join as playable skins? We‚Äôll have to wait and see what‚Äôs in store for Chapter 7.

What do you think of the DeLorean in Fortnite? Excited to try it out? Hope to see more Back to the Future in the game? Let us know in the comments and on the official Insider Gaming Discord!

For more Fortnite, check out our guides on Chapter 6 Zero Hour and the F1 skins. Make sure to subscribe to our weekly newsletter!

item.title: Uma Racing Codes (November 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Uma Racing monthly redeem codes for November 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including Cash and plenty more.

For magnificent victories in Uma Racing, you‚Äôll not only need to master the track art but also use the finest Umas. Umas are special abilities that are infamous for changing the tables of any losing race. Many will grind for hours to save money to purchase Umas, while the rest go all-out with Robux. You can stand out by redeeming the active codes and avoiding the initial grinding phase. Simply redeem these active codes to fill your in-game wallet with lots of money. Lead the charge from the start to the end by redeeming the featured codes in this Roblox experience.

Active Uma Racing Codes

  • IOOKMEMBERS ‚Äì 3000$ (New)
  • FIFTYTHOUSANDLIKES ‚Äì 3000$
  • THANKFORSUPPORTIN ‚Äì 4500$
  • RELEASECUH ‚Äì 1500$
  • MBFORANOTHERDELAYBRO ‚Äì 2500$
  • UFFUEWANTTOMATO ‚Äì 1000$
  • FIRSTBUGFIX ‚Äì 1500$

Inactive Uma Racing Codes

CINDERELLAGRAY||PLAYTEST||DELAYMBBRO||SORRYFORBUG

How To Redeem Uma Racing Codes? 

Before you launch Uma Racing to redeem the active codes, join the game‚Äôs official Roblox group. To do so, follow these steps: 

  1. Search for Uma Racing and open its homepage.
  2. Scroll down to find the ‚ÄúDeveloper‚Äù tab and select it. 
  3. Choose the blue ‚ÄúJoin Community‚Äù to join the official Roblox group. 

After this, follow these instructions to redeem the active codes: 

  1. Start Uma Racing and select the ‚ÄúMENU‚Äù button. 
  2. Press the ‚ÄúCodes‚Äù button on the right side to open the code box. 
  3. Copy any active code and paste it into the ‚ÄúENTER CODE‚Äù box. 
  4. Finish the redemption process by clicking the ‚ÄúREDEEM‚Äù button. 

More About Uma Racing Codes

The free money earned from the active codes in Uma Racing can be spent on various Products. Notably, Umas, special styles that can be used to increase your chances of winning and improve your performance on the track. Here are all the Umas, their chances, and price:

  • Umas- 250$
  • Common ‚Äì 55% ‚Äì Haru Urara
  • Uncommon ‚Äì 30% ‚Äì Air Groove 
  • Rare ‚Äì 13.5% ‚Äì Dalwe Scarlet and Gold Ship 
  • Legendary ‚Äì 1.5% ‚Äì Silence Suzuka, Rice Shower, Tamamo Cross, and Oguri Cap 

Other Products include the following: 

  • Emotes ‚Äì Grab random Emotes ‚Äì 250$
  • MVPs ‚Äì Get MVP and show off to the crowd ‚Äì 125,00$
  • Name Tags ‚Äì Show off your unique name tag in the chat ‚Äì 2500$
  • Openings ‚Äì Warm up before starting the race ‚Äì 2500$

FAQs on Uma Racing codes

What are the latest active codes?

‚ÄúIOOKMEMBERS‚Äù is the only latest active code. 

What code can be redeemed for the maximum amount of money?

‚ÄúTHANKFORSUPPORTIN‚Äù is the only latest active code. 

When will the active codes expire?

The active codes are speculated to turn inactive right after a new in-game update drops.
